content: 3 point knotwork chart designed by michelle ryan copyright © 2005 by michelle ryan & nezumiworld all rights reserved how to read graph abbreviations & symbols stitch symbol chain stitch treble_crochet uk/ double pattern/ graph stitches materials additional information starting at the bottom of the chart chain 166 chain 3 to turn which will count as the first treble_crochet uk/ double_crochet usa of first row 1 treble_crochet uk/ 1 double_crochet usa into the 5th chain from the hook treble_crochet uk/ double_crochet usa into the next 2 chains to complete bottom right solid square of pattern continue following chart for first row reading from right to left after completing first row chain 3 to turn to start the next row continue following the chart until all the row are complete at the end of row 54 fasten_off contact if you have any problems or enquiries concerning this pattern please email me at nezumi@nezumiworld com 3 point knotwork chart - michelle ryan/nezumiworld©2005 you are not allowed to copy this pattern for sale or to make an item for sale/ profit the pattern is for personal use only if you would like to use the pattern for profit or to make an item for sale you require a licence from me please email for details instruction s/ chart generated using crochet designs software please visit http //www nezumiworld com/ for more patterns how to instructions plus lots more nezumiworld blog at http //nezumiworld blogspot com nezumiworld buttons at http //www cafepress com/nezumiworld
